<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>false</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_1383184_charityb_bid</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="x_1383184_charityb_bid">your_bid_amountGT_FIELDitem_name.highest_bid_amount^your_bid_amountGT_FIELDitem_name.start_bid_amount^EQ<item endquery="false" field="your_bid_amount" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="GT_FIELD" or="false" value="item_name.highest_bid_amount"/><item endquery="false" field="your_bid_amount" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="GT_FIELD" or="false" value="item_name.start_bid_amount"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>BS3(Test 2)</name><order>450</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous) {
    var yourBidAmount = parseFloat(current.getValue('your_bid_amount'));
    var itemSysId = parseFloat(current.getValue('item_name'));

    //     // Query the item record associated with the bid
    var item = new GlideRecord('x_1383184_charityb_item');
    if (item.get(itemSysId)) {
        //         var currentHighestBid = item.getValue('highest_bid_amount') || 0; // Convert to float, default to 0 if highest bid amount is not set
        //         var currentStartBid = item.getValue('start_bid_amount') || 0;

        // // 		WORKIN CODE
        item.setValue('item_name.highest_bid_amount', yourBidAmount);
        item.update();
        // /********************************************************* */
        // //         if (yourBidAmount > currentHighestBid) {
        // //             // Update the highest bid amount on the item
        // //             item.setValue('highest_bid_amount', yourBidAmount);
        // //             item.update();
        // //         } else {
        // //             gs.addErrorMessage('Your bid amount must be higher than the current highest bid amount.');
        // // 			current.setAbortAction(true);
        // //             item.setValue('highest_bid_amount', currentStartBid);

        // }



        // /************************************************************ */
    } else {
        // If the item record is not found, add an error message and prevent the insert
        gs.addErrorMessage('The item associated with this bid was not found.');
        current.setAbortAction(true);
    }
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>lalitha</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-05-28 05:03:44</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>c7ac66ff935e461094e3f15a7bba10f9</sys_id><sys_mod_count>38</sys_mod_count><sys_name>BS3(Test 2)</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="CharityBids" source="x_1383184_charityb">bcaeeadb9369421094e3f15a7bba1090</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="CharityBids">bcaeeadb9369421094e3f15a7bba1090</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_c7ac66ff935e461094e3f15a7bba10f9</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>lalitha</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-05-30 05:55:04</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=c7ac66ff935e461094e3f15a7bba10f9"/></record_update>
